patthana21.47:1.1.pli: Nasāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.48:4.1.pli: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.49:1.1.pli: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana21.49:2.1.pli: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.49:3.1.pli: (Naāsavañceva naanāsavaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayena tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.49:4.1.pli: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:1.1.pli: Naappaccayaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:2.1.pli: Naappaccayaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:3.1.pli: Naappaccayaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:5.1.pli: Nasanidassanaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:6.1.pli: Nasanidassanaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:7.1.pli: Nasanidassanaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano abyākato ca anidassano abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.5:8.1.pli: Nasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:9.1.pli: Nasappaṭighaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:11.1.pli: Naarūpiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:12.1.pli: Naarūpiṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:13.1.pli: Narūpiṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:14.1.pli: Nalokuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana21.5:15.1.pli: Nalokuttaraṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.5:16.1.pli: Nalokiyaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokuttaraṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana21.5:17.1.pli: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana21.5:18.1.pli: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana21.5:20.1.pli: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci naviññeyyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.

patthana22.17:1.1.pli: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana22.17:3.1.pli: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana22.17:6.1.pli: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Dve pañhāyeva.)

patthana22.17:7.1.pli: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Dveyeva. Paṭhamaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, dutiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, tatiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ kātabbaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
